name: Tarta de Santiago (St. James Cake)
steps: Mix the almonds, sugar, cinnamon, and lemon zest in a large bowl.
Beat the eggs and incorporate them into the mixture until a homogeneous batter is obtained.
Pour the batter into a previously greased and floured mold.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180Â°C for 30-35 minutes.
Let cool. Dust with icing sugar using the Cross of Saint James as a stencil.
